name: Knut Reinert
content: Knut Reinert • Algorithmic Bioinformatics (ABI) • Department of Mathematics and Computer Science Springe direkt zu Inhalt Department of Mathematics and Computer Science/Computer Science/Algorithmic Bioinformatics (ABI) Path NavigationHomepageComputer ScienceWork GroupsAlgorithmic Bioinformatics (ABI)MembersProfessorsKnut ReinertProf. Dr. Knut Reinert ContactResearchPublicationsImage Credit: David AusserhoferFreie Universität BerlinInstitut für InformatikAlgorithmische BioinformatikProfessorDevelopment of mathematical models for analyzing biomedical mass data, mostly sequence analysis, proteomics, omics data. As Max Planck Fellow, Prof. Reinert also leads a team at the Max-Planck-Institute for Molecular Genetics.AddressTakustr. 9Room 01214195 BerlinTelephone+49 30 838 75222Emailknut.reinert[at]fu-berlin.deHomepagehttp://www.reinert-lab.deOffice hoursmake an appointment FU Research Max-Planck-Institut für molekulare Genetik Max Planck Fellow FU Pressemitteilung idw results for: Reinert, Knut results for: Reinert, K.
